entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Pickle Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
